channel.title: Getting back into Server development
channel.description: So I've abandoned server development for the longest time. I feel like I should give it another chance and see if it peaks my interest again. I've got a pretty generic 317 PI (and a rs06 server somewhere). What should I do to get back into it?

item.title: Getting back into Server development
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

mr extremez:

If you don’t know much java try to learn more java before trying to program a source, then attempt to create a decent server.

I never said I knew “little java” I said I hadn’t done much.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting back into Server development
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

If you don’t know much java try to learn more java before trying to program a source, then attempt to create a decent server.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting back into Server development
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

drubrkletern:

If your coming back, i suggest you ditch the pi and move onto something like rune source, apollo, or hyperion

I never liked those sources personally. I’ve always wanted to see what you can get out of a pi or a delta even, too bad I can’t do clients worth a shit or I’d make a delta…

[quote=“b b0yz 4, post:2, topic:470080”]If you know Java then go straight to the source and start fixing up some bugs or implementing some small stuff into the server.

If you don’t, I suggest you purchase a book (with excercises) and learn the basics of Java.[/quote]
wuts jaba?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern

item.title: Getting back into Server development
item.dc:creator: @b_b0yz_4 b b0yz 4
item.description:
@b_b0yz_4 wrote:

If you know Java then go straight to the source and start fixing up some bugs or implementing some small stuff into the server.

If you don’t, I suggest you purchase a book (with excercises) and learn the basics of Java.

Read full topic
